parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets checked state of a [[CT_CHECKBOXES]] control. Since Arma 3 v1.71.141591 it is possible to check checkbox with given index in multiple checkboxes set-up. For more information see [[CT_CHECKBOXES]].</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control '''ctrlSetChecked''' checked </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] - [[CT_CHECKBOXES]] control. If control contain multiple checkboxes, only checkbox with index 0 is queried. </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> checked: [[Boolean]] - [[true]] to check, [[false]] to uncheck the checkbox  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value>control '''ctrlSetChecked''' [index, checked]  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(''Since Arma 3 v1.71.141591'')</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] - [[CT_CHECKBOXES]] control </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value>  [index, checked]: [[Array]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> index: [[Number]] - checkbox index  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> checked: [[Boolean]]- [[true]] to check, [[false]] to uncheck the checkbox   </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER24</name>=<value>  

</value></part><part><name> r2</name>=<value>[[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctrlSetChecked]] [[true]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctrlSetChecked]] [3, [[true]]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[ctrlChecked]], [[cbChecked]], [[cbSetChecked]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>
